Package pokerapp.view.card

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CardImageFactory
    Interface for factory that will pass card images to the view
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardBackImageFactory
    Dishes out cards images for pokerapp when passed a filepath
    CardImage
    Deals with rendering and providing images to pokerapp
    CardImageFactoryImpl
    Factory for converting cards into card image references
    CardImageFlyweightFactory
    Supplies card images on demand up to maximum of a deck's worth, to preserve memory
    CardView
    Abstract class, acting as a bridge to rendering and copying functions for images
    CardViewModelFactory
    creates card references and images for the card view models
    NullCardImageFactory
    Returns a null card image which is used by card image fatories
    SelectedCardImageFactory
    returns filtered card images in pokerapp for when the user has selected cards to exchange
